solo.description: append text after the cursor N times

shift.description: append text after the end of the line N times

g.description: print ascii value of character under the cursor

z.description: open a closed fold, close an open fold

zShift.description: open a closed fold or close an open fold recursively

control.description: add N to number at/after cursor

shift.description: cursor N WORDS backward

z.description: redraw, cursor line at bottom of window

solo.description: delete Nmove text [into register x] and start insert

shift.description: change from the cursor position to the end of the line, and N-1 more lines [into register x]; synonym for 'c$'

z.description: close a fold

squareBracket.description: cursor N times backwards to start of change

shift.description: delete the characters under the cursor until the end of the line and N-1 more lines [into register x]; synonym for 'd$'

g.description: go to definition of word under the cursor in current function

gShift.description: go to definition of word under the cursor in current file

z.description: delete a fold

squareBracket.description: show first #define found in current and included files matching the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

squareBracketShift.description: list all #defines found in current and included files matching the word under the cursor, start searching at cursor position

control.description: scroll Down N lines (default: half a screen)

solo.description: cursor forward to the end of word N

shift.description: cursor forward to the end of WORD N

g.description: go backwards to the end of the previous word

gShift.description: go backwards to the end of the previous WORD

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll horizontally to position the cursor at the end (right side) of the screen

control.description: scroll N lines upwards (N lines Extra)

solo.description: cursor to Nth occurrence of {char} to the right

shift.description: cursor to the Nth occurrence of {char} to the left

g.description: start editing the file whose name is under the cursor

gShift.description: start editing the file whose name is under the cursor and jump to the line number following the filename.

z.description: create a fold for Nmove text

zShift.description: create a fold for N lines

shift.description: cursor to line N, default last line

g.description: cursor to line N, default first line

z.description: mark word as good spelled word

zShift.description: mark word as good spelled word

control.description: display current file name and position

solo.description: cursor N chars to the left

shift.description: cursor to line N from top of screen

g.description: start Select mode

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll screen N characters to the right

zShift.description: when 'wrap' off scroll half a screenwidth to the right

solo.description: insert text before the cursor N times

shift.description: insert text before the first CHAR on the line N times

g.description: like 'i', but first move to the |'^| mark

gShift.description: like 'I', but always start in column 1

z.description: toggle 'foldenable'

squareBracket.description: show first line found in current and included files that contains the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

squareBracketShift.description: list all lines found in current and included files that contain the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

shift.description: Join N lines; default is 2

g.description: like 'j', but when 'wrap' on go N screen lines down

z.description: move to the start of the next fold

shift.description: lookup Keyword under the cursor with 'keywordprg'

g.description: like 'k', but when 'wrap' on go N screen lines up

z.description: move to the end of the previous fold

solo.description: cursor N chars to the right

shift.description: cursor to line N from bottom of screen

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll screen N characters to the left

zShift.description: when 'wrap' off scroll half a screenwidth to the left

shift.description: cursor to middle line of screen

g.description: go to character at middle of the screenline

z.description: subtract one from 'foldlevel'

squareBracket.description: cursor N times back to start of member function

solo.description: repeat the latest '/' or '?' N times

shift.description: repeat the latest '/' or '?' N times in opposite direction

g.description: find the next match with the last used search pattern and Visually select it

gShift.description: find the previous match with the last used search pattern and Visually select it

z.description: reset 'foldenable'

solo.description: begin a new line below the cursor and insert text, repeat N times

shift.description: begin a new line above the cursor and insert text, repeat N times

g.description: cursor to byte N in the buffer

z.description: open fold

control.description: go to N older entry in jump list

solo.description: put the text [from register x] after the cursor N times

shift.description: put the text [from register x] before the cursor N times

g.description: put the text [from register x] after the cursor N times, leave the cursor after it

gShift.description: put the text [from register x] before the cursor N times, leave the cursor after it

squareBracket.description: like 'P', but adjust indent to current line

solo.description: record typed characters into named register {0-9a-zA-Z}(uppercase to append). There are three special cases (q: q/ q?)

shift.description: to 'Ex' mode

g.description: format Nmove text

gShift.description: switch to 'Ex' mode with Vim editing

shift.description: enter replace mode: overtype existing characters, repeat the entered text N-1 times

g.description: virtual replace N chars with {char}

z.description: add one to 'foldlevel'

control.description: redo changes which were undone with 'u'

solo.description: (substitute) delete N characters [into register x] and start insert

shift.description: delete N lines [into register x] and start insert; synonym for 'cc'.

g.description: go to sleep for N seconds (default 1)

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll horizontally to position the cursor at the start (left side) of the screen

squareBracket.description: move to the previous misspelled word

solo.description: cursor till before Nth occurrence of {char} to the right

shift.description: cursor till after Nth occurrence of {char} to the left

g.description: go to the next tab page

gShift.description: go to the previous tab page

z.description: redraw, cursor line at top of window

control.description: jump to N older Tag in tag list

shift.description: undo all latest changes on one line

g.description: make Nmove text lowercase

control.description: scroll N lines Upwards (default: half a screen)

shift.description: linewise Visual mode

g.description: reselect the previous Visual area

gShift.description: don't reselect the previous Visual area when executing a mapping or menu in Select mode

z.description: open enough folds to view the cursor line

shift.description: cursor N WORDS forward

g.description: format Nmove text and keep cursor

z.description: mark word as wrong (bad) spelled word

zShift.description: mark word as wrong (bad) spelled word

solo.description: delete N characters under and after the cursor [into register x]

shift.description: delete N characters before the cursor [into register x]

z.description: re-apply 'foldlevel' and do 'zv'

control.description: subtract N from number at/after cursor

shift.description: yank N lines [into register x]; synonym for 'yy'
extended commands starting with 'Z'

z.description: redraw, cursor line at center of window

squareBracket.description: move to start of open fold

shift.description: 'tildeop' off: switch case of N characters under cursor and move the cursor N characters to the right
filter Nmove text through the {filter} command
execute the contents of register {a-z} N times
search backward for the Nth occurrence of the ident under the cursor
cursor to the end of Nth next line
find the next (curly/square) bracket on this line and go to its match, or go to matching comment bracket, or go to matching preprocessor directive.
cursor to the first CHAR of the line
repeat last :s
search forward for the Nth occurrence of the ident under the cursor
cursor N sentences backward

solo.description: cursor to the first char of the line

shift.description: cursor N sentences forward

solo.description: cursor to the first CHAR N lines higher

shift.description: cursor to the first CHAR N - 1 lines lower
same as <CR>

solo.description: go to N newer entry in jump list

shift.description: cursor N paragraphs backward
cursor N paragraphs forward
cursor to column N

solo.description: repeat latest f, t, F or T N times

shift.description: start entering an Ex command

solo.description: cursor to the first CHAR on the line with mark {a-zA-Z0-9}

shift.description: use register {a-zA-Z0-9.%#:-"} for next delete, yank or put (uppercase to append) ({.%#:} only work with put)

solo.description: cursor to the first CHAR N lines lower
repeat latest f, t, F or T in opposite direction N times

shift.description: shift Nmove lines one 'shiftwidth' leftwards

solo.description: repeat last change with count replaced with N

shift.description: shift Nmove lines one 'shiftwidth' rightwards

solo.description: search forward for the Nth occurrence of {pattern}

shift.description: search backward for the Nth previous occurrence of {pattern}
